steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and let it cool to room temperature naturally (approximately 1-2 hours). 2. Do not remove the crucible until it has cooled to avoid thermal shock.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and let it cool to room temperature naturally (approximately 1-2 hours). 2. Do not remove the crucible until it has cooled to avoid thermal shock.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Use a diamond cutter or saw to trim the sample to the desired dimensions (3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches). 3. Sand the edges and surfaces with fine-grit sandpaper to achieve a smooth finish. 4. Optionally, seal the surface with a protective coating to enhance durability.
